issue.title: What packages are needed to use CommsClient?

content.raw:
`libignition-transport7-dev` is the name of the dependency for Ignition Transport. As Jon mentioned, other than that, you need the subt\_communication\_broker ROS package. Here’s the list of dependencies of that package in case it helps:

```
developer@bb9:~/subt_ws$ rospack depends subt_communication_broker
cpp_common
rostime
roscpp_traits
roscpp_serialization
catkin
genmsg
genpy
message_runtime
gencpp
geneus
gennodejs
genlisp
message_generation
rosbuild
rosconsole
std_msgs
rosgraph_msgs
xmlrpcpp
roscpp
geometry_msgs
subt_rf_interface
subt_communication_model
```
